name: Little Snake (cggames)
description:
Remember the old days you played Snake game on your mobile phone? You don't need to miss it anymore. With this improved version with new features but with the same appeal you can go back in time!!

Now with two game modes: 

Normal mode, where you must eat the food and grow as much as you can, collecting coins and 10 differents power ups.

Obstacles mode, where you must play through 25 amazing levels, eating the food and avoiding the walls along the way.
